T02D3666:278a-3: tshe 'phel ba'i cho ga / rje btsun ma 'phags ma sgrol ma la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02D3666:278b-0: sngon du gsungs pa'i rim pas @278b sgrol ma dkar mo zhal gcig pa phyag gnyis pa /
T02D3666:278b-1: skyol mo krung du bzhugs par bsgoms te /
T02D3666:278b-2: thugs kar zla ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi steng du sa bon gyi ge blta'o //
T02D3666:278b-3: de la 'od 'phros pas mdun gyi nam mkha' la
T02D3666:278b-4: mgon po tshe dpag tu med pa sku mdog dkar
T02D3666:278b-5: po mnyam gzhag gi phyag rgya can yum dang bcas
T02D3666:278b-6: pa / phyag gi steng na rin po che'i bum
T02D3666:278b-7: pa can gyi mdun du mi bskyod pa sngon po
T02D3666:278b-9: g-yon rin po che'i bum pa can gyis yum la 'khyud pa /
T02D3666:278b-10: g-yas su rin 'byung gser btso ma'i mdog can phyag g-yas mchog sbyin /
T02D3666:278b-11: g-yon ni snga ma'i tshul dang mtshungs so //
T02D3666:278b-12: rgyab tu rnam snang dmar po /
T02D3666:278b-13: g-yas byang chub mchog gi phyag rgya can /
T02D3666:278b-14: g-yon du don yod grub pa ljang gu skyabs sbyin gyi phyag rgya can te rigs lnga dang /
T02D3666:278b-15: yum thams cad ni rang snang gi yum mo //
T02D3666:278b-16: de dag la byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs dpag tu med pas bskor bar dmigs te /
T02D3666:278b-17: skyabs 'gro la sogs pa tshul bzhin du bya'o //
T02D3666:278b-18: tshe 'phel bar gsol ba gdab pa ni /
T02D3666:278b-19: aom na mo bha ga wa te aa mi t'a bh'a wa ti ta th'a ga ta /
T02D3666:278b-20: sarba buddha bo dhi sa tva sya aa ham a'a yurwardha ni /
T02D3666:278b-23: aa dhishth'a na aa dhishthi te sv'a h'a /
T02D3666:278b-25: snang ba mtha' yas la sogs pa yab rnams kyis
T02D3666:278b-26: so so'i yum la bskul te tshe'i dngos grub brtan
T02D3666:278b-27: par byas nas / bdag nyid la dbang bskur ba'i sbyor ba la zhugs te 'dug par bsam /
T02D3666:278b-28: bdag nyid kyang spyi bo tshangs pa'i bu ga kha
T02D3666:278b-29: phye ste snying ga'i chu skyes la gnas pa'i 'byung
T02D3666:278b-30: ba bzhi'i rtsa ka phye ste /
T02D3666:278b-31: rtsa thams cad so sor kha phye bar bsam /
T02D3666:278b-32: de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis bdag la 'chi med kyi dbang bskur te /
T02D3666:278b-33: ye shes kyi bdud rtsi'i rgyun tshang pa'i bu ga nas blugs pas rtsa thams cad khengs pa dang /
T02D3666:278b-34: khyad par du chu skyes kyi rtsa lnga gang bas
T02D3666:278b-35: srog 'dzin pa rnal du tshud de 'chi ba med
T02D3666:278b-36: par bsam zhing sngags 'di nyer gcig bzlas so //
T02D3666:278b-37: aom t'a re tutt'a re tu re a'a yurwardha ka dha bhya:sv'a h'a /
T02D3666:278b-38: zhes pas de bzhin gshegs pa rnams snang ba mtha' yas la 'dus te /
T02D3666:278b-39: de dbu rgyan gyi tshul du bdag gi spyi bor byon pas tshe rtan par 'gyur ro //
T02D3666:278b-41: des skyo nas ldang bar 'dod na mi dmigs pas zin pa'i dge ba bsngo'o //
T02D3666:279a-0: @279a * // snga ma ltar thun bzhi la sogs pa bsgoms na
T02D3666:279a-1: zla ba drug gis 'chi ba med pa'i dngos grub
T02D3666:279a-2: tu 'gyur ro // gzhan yang ci rigs pas kyang 'phel lo //
T02D3666:279a-3: sgrol ma tshe spel ba zhes bya ba'i rig pa
T02D3666:279a-4: / slob dpon tsandra go mis mdzad pa rdzogs so
T02D3666:279a-6: / // / ma h'a pandi ta ratna rakshi ta'i zhal snga nas /
